Oaxaca (city).title: Oaxaca (city)
Oaxaca (city).byline: Oaxaca (Oaxaca de Juárez) is a city in the state of Oaxaca in Mexico.

Oaxaca (state).title: Oaxaca (state)
Oaxaca (state).byline: Oaxaca (pronounced Wahahka) is a state on the Pacific Ocean in southwest of Mexico.

Oaxtepec.title: Oaxtepec
Oaxtepec.byline: Oaxtepec (pronounced Watehpec) is a city of 7,000 people (2020) in Morelos.
